website_summaries.verdict: Best pick for fun shot glasses that are unique and versatile.
pros: Customers note that these shot glasses are well-designed and durable
They stand out for their cute style and lids
Many commented on additional uses beyond a shot glass and how well these worked for gift-giving of flavored liquors and more
cons: A few had issues with seals not working properly or lids rusting

customer_reviews.title: The jars are great, but the caps rust
customer_reviews.text: The jars themselves look and hold up great. Everyone is a fan of them when I hand them a shot in these small mason jars. However, a couple of the caps did start to rust. I don't often use the caps, so this isn't a problem, but I would not let water or other liquids stay on these lids for fear of more rust.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: and these do the trick nicely. I like that they do not fly around ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute little jars. I use them for liquids in my husband's breakfasts/lunches to go. Had a hard time finding liquid-proof containers, and these do the trick nicely. I like that they do not fly around the dishwasher like small plastic containers do. Could've done without the "shooter" text on the jars but this is the best I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Granite Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Spice jars
customer_reviews.text: These jars are great for my spice rack. I actually attached them by the lid, to a magnetic strip and wrote the spice name on the bottom of the jar. The raised print isn't obnoxiously high and barely shows. So, you could use them for shots and then keep them for something else without having the word, "shots" screaming out all the time. I might even buy more for the purpose. They came very securely packed, too.
customer_reviews.author: LibrarianLee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Jars
customer_reviews.text: I needed very small glass storage jars to store some food items in because I don't want to use plastic. These little jars are perfect! They are nice and thick........ and also adorable! I especially like that the lid has a foam lining where the rim of the jar rests so that there isn't any leakage of liquid. The price is also the best I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: BarMar

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these jars. I bought for the sole purpose of using them to temporarily store my wheatgrass juice and that's exactly what I do with them. They're perfect and I'm sure I'll be purchasing more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: When I saw these, I knew I had to have them! My friends come over for vodka and beer on Saturday night, and when I served the shots up in these it was an instant hit! Perfect size, thick glass, and the little metal lids add that "authentic shine" touch. Definitely the hit of the party!
customer_reviews.author: Edward A. Averill

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Presentation for Gifting! Bought for myself, but giving whole boxes to many people this year!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product! I bought them for myself because I didn't have a jigger and 8 glasses for the price of one just couldn't be beat. Haha. When I received them, I was so impressed by the quality and by the packaging that with my daughter's blessing, I am giving the whold beautiful unused box of shot glasses to my granddaughter as part of her 14th birthday gift. I put cash on top of the glasses and re-closed the box, wrapped it up in gift wrap and she will love them for storing craft supplies! I will buy another box for myself and buy more as gifts, to be sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are super cute, but the kids rusted
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute, but the kids rusted. A bit disappointed because I hoped to use these to store foods and didn't anticipate rust.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie M.

customer_reviews.title: New Hayley Cherie fan!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the glasses...I’ll use for spice jars. Only thing that briefly freaked me out was the Hayley..Cherie sticker. I didn’t realize at the time it was your company name. I have 2 dear friends...one named Hayley...the other named Cherie...both unusual spellings. I thought Amazon highjacked My FB page. Silly me! Thanks for the jars. I love them! Keep offering unusual products! I’m a fan!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Very cool shot glasses!
customer_reviews.text: These are just the coolest and unique shot glasses. They come in a little box separated out so not to break. Great price, can't wait to give these at Christmas!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela S.

customer_reviews.title: I keep coffee beans in them..  Fantastic for a 2-cup morning.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I use it for coffee. One bag of Starbucks whole beans from the grocery store almost perfectly fills 16 jars. Cons: one of the lids on the second box I bought was bent. I've been able to use it, but I fear it doesn't seal well. Overall: if you want something small to seal small amounts of something, this is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Teeter

customer_reviews.title: Fun shot glasses!
customer_reviews.text: These shot glasses are adorable and so much fun! I made these Fireball shots for 4th of July and they were a big hit. Everyone asked where I got the glasses :) I have lots of other ideas for these cute little things!!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Love these shot glasses...
customer_reviews.text: These are great shot glasses, you can even pour the shots, put the tops on, put them in the fridge to chill and do the shots later.
customer_reviews.author: K Vrabel

customer_reviews.title: High quality mason jar glasses
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for shots! Since they came with a lid I poured a little alcohol and put some starburst in them and let it sit overnight 😁 the glass is high quality. For the price you won’t find anything better.
customer_reviews.author: brittanycherry

customer_reviews.title: adorable
customer_reviews.text: bought for office Christmas party gift exchange. they are really cute shot glasses. can serve multiple purposes and uses.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie L.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift for a friend's 21st birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a friend's 21st birthday. They suit his hipster, millenial lifestyle while ironically hoarding him down with these non minimalist trinkets. He does use them often :]
customer_reviews.author: Siredhuman333

customer_reviews.title: Great little jars
customer_reviews.text: I love these little jars. They are exactly what I was looking for and just the right size to use when I take lunch to work. I have put liquids in them like milk or salad dressing and they have not leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Foxglove41

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Deceptive
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered them, I went by the photo thinking they were colored; yet, I did read today that they are clear as they certainly are, so why not just show a photo of clear. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: SRF

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Mason Jars
customer_reviews.text: I love these little glasses! They are adorable. I needed to find smaller glasses for an upcoming event. Our mixed drinks will be served from a large Mason Jar with a spout. Imagine how excited I was to find the matching Mason Jar Shot Glasses. Just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking - low quality - no straws
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping the mini straws depicted in the photo would be included - they were not. The jars themselves looked cheap. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pretty & portable thanks to a screw-on lid
customer_reviews.text: love these pretty little glasses and I plan to use a silver paint pen to decorate them for NYE and let my guests take theirs home as a momento of our party...
customer_reviews.author: Linda Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: I'll Drink to That!
customer_reviews.text: Great unique shooters. Nice quality glass. Although these will primarily be used as shooters, the lids are nice to have in order to use these for other purposes. My son took a couple to use as vials to test water ph.

customer_reviews.title: Pending Party...

customer_reviews.title: OKay
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I was looking for but I still like them and they are nice quality.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my Mason jar collection
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my Mason jar collection. I try not to store anything in plastic anymore, and find it so convenient to have a selection of sizes. These are perfect for a tiny dessert, or salad toppings for the lunch bag. I also freeze excess kefir grains sometimes, and this will take up less space in the freezer than the 4 oz, jar. Are extra lids available for a future purchase? Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Great little glasses

customer_reviews.title: Great gift Idea

customer_reviews.title: Unique, sturdy Mason jar shooter!

I liked these so much that I ordered a second set of 8 jars so we wouldn't have to wait for 1 set to come out of the dishwasher.

product_meta.title: Hayley Cherie - Mason Jar Shot Glasses with Lids (Set of 8) – Mini Mason Shooter Glass - 2 Ounces
feature_bullets: GREAT VALUE - Set of 8 small mason jars with silver lids. Perfect for drinks, parties, crafts, hoedowns, moonshine, weddings, party favors etc.

CLASSIC MASON JAR - The glasses are clear and hold 2oz (60mls). The words "Mason Shooter" is embossed onto the side of each glass. Each silver lid is imprinted with a circular design, which matches with the mason shooter logo.
WON'T LEAK - There is a white seal on the inside of each lid to ensure they don't leak! The glasses and lids are Lead free and BPA free.
GREAT FOR GIFTS - These small / mini glasses are fun and unique... perfect for Christmas presents!
PREMIUM GLASS - These are tough, sturdy shot glasses that will not break easily and are also dishwasher safe (the lids should be hand washed).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,123 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
